post:
Poli Systems is a new hosting company located in Switzerland with high-end material. We provide only dedicated ressources server with no overselling. We don’t care if you use 100% of your CPU all the time it’s dedicated and for you !

We currently have offers for Ryzen VDS base on Ryzen 1700X. All our pricing are avalible in CHF/EURO/USD.

We make 10% to hosted talk users for the first month so apply the monthy price - 10% !
Simply enter the code Hosted-Talk when you order

VDS 1 - Ryzen 1700X SSD
For the price of 11.19$ per month or 122.20$ per year !
Order here !

1 Dedicated Ryzen core (3.4 GHz)
4 GB of DDR4 ram
24gb High speed SSD (On 2 disks in RAID 1)
Unlimited bandwidth (fair use 100 tb for exemple C:)
1 Dedicated IP
/80 IPV6 subnet
100 mbps
Easy management panel (Based on Virtualizor)
2 Minutes automatic setup
KVM
Choose any Linux system (Ubuntu,debian,centos, scientific linux, fedora,…)

VDS 2 - Ryzen 1700X SSD
For the price of 20.49$ per month or 231$ per year !
Order here !

2 Dedicated Ryzen core (3.4 GHz)
8 GB of DDR4 ram
48gb High speed SSD (On 2 disks in RAID 1)
Unlimited bandwidth (fair use 100 tb for exemple C:)
1 Dedicated IP

Choose any Linux system (Ubuntu,debian,centos, scientific linux, fedora,…)

VDS 3 - Ryzen 1700X SSD
For the price of 37.49$ per month or 436.45$ per year !
Order here !

4 Dedicated Ryzen core (3.4 GHz)

Choose any Linux system (Ubuntu,debian,centos, scientific linux, fedora,…)

For web offers we are planning them but due to the monthly cost of Plesk on dedicated instance we need to grow a bit more but we are definitily looking at it !
All the KVM machines you saw up there are hosted in Germany !

To be with the current times we have a Discord server ! You can join it here. It’s empty for now but i really hope to see more pepoles in it !

If you need more information join our discord or simply open a ticket ! I hope you are intressted in the offers !
